LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.label: Balbari
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.description: A superior multi-purpose combat tank protected by a projectile interceptor shield. It's autocannon is capable of annihilating light and heavily armored enemies with ease. Additionally it is equipped with a long range anti-tank missile.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_HeavyAutoCannon.label: Balbari Autocannon
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_HeavyAutoCannon.descript: An automatic cannon for the Balbari that fires a 13.7mm Hotchkiss rounds. A medium MAT missile launcher is also mounted on top of the cannon.
